attributes.additional_details: Anybody who watched the state opening of parliament today listened to political pundits; TV broadcasters and (God forbid) elected dishonourbles saying that this whole ceremony demonstrates that the House of Commons is obliged to listen to the people and not to the House of Lords nor the Queen.  I'm still waiting for David Cameron to listen to me when I tell him I want out of the EU and I want an opportunity to vote so in a legally binding IN or OUT referendum, which he promised me 3 years ago, to get me to vote for him which, like the lemming I am, I believed him (may I rot in hell for doing so) and did so but rest assured - HE WILL NEVER BE BELIEVED AGAIN, this side of his death.
